{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10129v1", "title": "Quasi-Irreducibility of Nonnegative Biquadratic Tensors", "summary": "While the adjacency tensor of a bipartite 2-graph is a nonnegative
biquadratic tensor, it is inherently reducible. To address this limitation, we
introduce the concept of quasi-irreducibility in this paper. The adjacency
tensor of a bipartite 2-graph is quasi-irreducible if that bipartite 2-graph is
not bi-separable. This new concept reveals important spectral properties:
although all M$^+$-eigenvalues are M$^{++}$-eigenvalues for irreducible
nonnegative biquadratic tensors, the M$^+$-eigenvalues of a quasi-irreducible
nonnegative biquadratic tensor can be either M$^0$-eigenvalues or
M$^{++}$-eigenvalues. Furthermore, we establish a max-min theorem for the
M-spectral radius of a nonnegative biquadratic tensor.", "main_category": "math.SP", "categories": "math.SP", "published": "2025-04-14T11:37:10Z"}
